ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.2.0 on 2024-11-30T20:44:42 [Issue ID 4000-97211] urn:comicvine:4000-97211
ComicInfo.Summary: Special 10Th Anniversary Issue !!! To celebrate ten years of the Femforce comic book, this wacky story takes place at a special V.I.P. opening for the fictional theme park based on the Femforce universe, Super Cosmos. As the members of the Femforce tour the park and attractions along with the AC Comics creative staff, things go terribly wrong, and thrill rides turn to deathtraps. How can that be? Theme park designer "Harcourt Leer" is actually Dr. Pretorius, robotics wizard and Femforce villain whose face had never been seen .A laugh riot as characatures of the real AC "family" mix wth there fictional creations. "Pandemonium At Pleasant Isle" is written by Bill Black, drawn by Brad Gorby, and inked by Mark Heike. Guest starring Bill and Rebekah Black, Brad Gorby, Mark Heike, Christie Churms, Chris Allen, Mike Frankovich, Jr., John Carl Buechler, Nyoka, Roger Brant, Tom Kelly, General Gordon, Dawn Hunter, Colt, Buckaroo Betty , Dragonfly, and Squeeks. As parts of the rides and attractions: Azagoth, Lucifer Sam, The Haunted Horseman, Dr, Jonathan Weir, The Green Lama, The Shade, The Brotherhood of Purity, Rayda and Alizarin Crimson .Color cover by Brad Gorby and Mark Heike, full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: Pandemonium at Pleasant Isle!
